title: Anyone notice how imobile rengar is without ult?
body: I mean, his passive only works on enemies (not like lee sin ward hop or jax leap) and now that there's camouflage and invisibility, if rengar tries to ult away, they'll just see him, cause that's how the new stealth mechanic works (I assume you already know that) {{champion:107}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Wtf are you talking about.  Rengar has great mobility to catch and chase people through the jungle.  

Getting out he now only has empowered w which costs him damage or cc.  

He is supposed to have good engage and chase and sacrifice escape for it.  Thats also tied to his lore as a hunter.
